title: Project,chalices, 1914–20
medium: Pencil, white heightening, blue and dark purple watercolor, cardboard with gray obverse (split)
inscribed: L; Verso: like A, number illegible
description: Vertical rectangle. Scheme as 1939-84-76. In Gothic style. Round foot and shaft. Circle with a cross at the foot. Two knobs, either with rinceaux. Calyx, blossoms, and a band with an inscription at the bottom part of the cup: UT NOBIS . . ETERNAM

tombstone.epitaph: Project,chalices, 1914–20.Pencil, white heightening, blue and dark purple watercolor, cardboard with gray obverse (split). 1939-84-77-c.
